OrgName: Sheppard Mullin Richter & Hampton, LLP & US Affiliates
activities: Sheppard Mullin is an international law firm with clients and personnel located throughout the world, including in the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland. In the course of its operations and through its representation of clients, Sheppard Mullin at times comes into custody of certain personal information received from the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Offline, online, & manually processed human resources and client data
recoursemech: Clients and others may contact Sheppard Mullin directly with privacy complaints or may contact JAMS directly. Questions or complaints about the way Sheppard Mullin treated HR-related personal information will be handled internally. If the matter is not resolved through internal Sheppard Mullin procedures, then the person will be directed to the European data protection authority in the jurisdiction where he or she works.
